transcript:
Customer: Duniya mein rehna hai to kaam kar pyare.
Haath jod sabko salam kar pyare.
Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Namaste good afternoon sir, Suchi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Namaste.
Executive: Namaste sir, aapne call karne ke liye bola tha actually us time mera lunch chal raha tha, to abhi bas lunch se over hui thi to maine kahin aapko call laga lu.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: To wahi wo to bataiye kya karna hai aapko.
Customer: Wo mere ko D6G aapko jo last time bol raha tha wo product mere ko bulldozer add karne ka hai usme.
Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ek second uska pehle sir aap mujhe photo bhej dijiye.
Customer: Abhi kya hai actually mera gaadi bhi tayar hone mein do-teen din ka ye hai. Main aap thoda net pe hi leke D6G ka aapko main brochure bhej raha hu.
Hmm.
Customer: Usme se information collect karke aap nahi daal sakte kya?
Executive: Nahi jaise aap mujhe ek kaam karo aap mujhe photo bhej dijiye aur aap mujhe us product ka naam bhej dijiye, thik hai? Thik hai okay. Main usko add karungi, jaise main add karungi na to ek specification wala wo page aata hai kuch paanch-chhe cheeze usme aap puchhenge wo aap mujhe bata doge turant-turant main uska promotion bhi karwa dungi.
Hmm.
Customer: Thik hai okay. To aap mujhe ye on call hi hoga sir kyuki access tabhi aayega mere paas.
Executive: To aap mujhe photo bhej dijiye pehle aur product ka naam niche likh dijiye.
Jo bhi photo hai do photo hai ya teen photo jo bhi aapko add karani hai.
Hmm.
Executive: Main aapko photo bhejti hu, ek hi product mein aapko add karna hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Bhejiye aap photo main hu call pe.
Customer: To aap sir aapne mujhe aap mere personal number pe call kar dete main aapne usse IndiaMART customer care se kyun call kiya?
Executive: Kya hua?
Customer: Main keh rahi hu aap mere personal number pe mujhe call kar dete aapne customer care se.
Customer: Nahi wo mere ko jaldi se dhyan mein nahi aaya, main thoda dusra kaam mein tha.
Executive: Sir aapne wo kara na to mere against wo ticket raise ho jati hai. Wo aapka ye product add karke main ye ticket close kar dungi. To aapke paas na ek feedback ke liye mail jayega to aap usme feedback de dijiyega.
Customer: Ek second main aapko uska ye bhejta hu ek second.
Executive: Haan photo bhej dijiye main call pe hu aapke saath.
Executive: Main aapko sir agar aap available ho zyada time hai to video meeting pe bhi aa sakte hain taki aaram se dikha du main saari cheeze aapko.
Customer: Nahi abhi thoda kaam bhi chal raha hai mera do second aapko main ye bhej raha hu uska.
Executive: Haan taki main isliye sir ye call pe karwa rahi hu na taki aap turant-turant mujhe detail bata do. To details bata doge na wahi specification to usse wo dalne ke baad product turant promote ho sakta hai.
Executive: Previous mein bheja hai sir aap photo hi bhej dijiye na photo.
Customer: Ek photo photo bhi bhej raha hu do minute do minute do minute.
Executive: Achha mujhe laga aapne bhej diya.
Customer: Dhara ko leke battery bhi chalao na tum minute.
Customer: Dhara ko leke battery bhi chalao na tum minute.
Customer: Do second main aapko photo bhi bhej raha hu.
Customer: Are Dhara ko leke battery bhi chalao na.
Executive: Sir paanch minute ke liye login karna padega.
Customer: Mila sir photo?
Customer: Haan do second do second wahi ye kar raha hu.
Executive: D6G Excel ke naam se hai series.
Customer: Haan 2 Excel 2 Excel.
Executive: 2 Excel achha yaha pe kewal Excel likha tha proper mujhe na. Aur D6G 2 Excel track type tractor achha thik hai.
Executive: Track type tractor.
Executive: Abhi tak aa chuka hai. Sir aapki company ka ye naam aap kaise pronounce karte ho?
Customer: Mahesh Lattatrre.
Executive: Lattatrre.
Executive: Aapne koi product remove bhi kiye hain kya sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi maine remove nahi kuch kiya hai.
Executive: Mujhe laga shayad koi product aapne remove bhi kiya ho to.
Customer: Ek ek photo abhi thoda achha mil gaya hai wo aapko daal raha hu main.
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho sir?
Customer: Ek photo achha wala mil gaya hai wo daal raha hu baki ka tab tak add kar lo as you wish usko.
Executive: Ek hi de do aap mujhe tab tak at least product add karke main specification dalwa du. Aap mujhe uske baad do photo aur bhej dena. Ek hi de do.
Customer: Nahi main actually kya karunga phir baad mein mera khud ka machine ka hi daal dunga tab tak ye aapka kaam chalu ho jaane to ye kar dijiye. Haan aur kya wahi cheez wahi cheez.
Executive: Wo to phir baad mein aap khud bhi add kar sakte ho lekin for the mean time.
Customer: Terminal piche karo. Santosh terminal piche.
Customer: Ye do photo bhej diye dekhiye aapko.
Hmm.
Executive: Haan D6. Sir sirf itna hi naam rakhna hai D6G Excel 2 Excel.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 2 Excel aage bhi iske kuch likhna hai 2 Excel tractor type?
Customer: Ye likh do track type tractor.
Customer: Haan likhiye na. Track type bulldozer aisa likh diya to bhi chalega.
Executive: Track type. Price kya rahega sir?
Customer: 24 CR ke liye 3 lakh per month.
Executive: Sir wo kya customer hi dikhega isme aapka one year ka customer. Nahi per seat ke hisab se bata rahe ho na aap mujhe?
Customer: Haan wahi hamara mahine ke hisab se chalta hai na.
Executive: Achha model isme D6 thik hai.
Customer: Haan to main wahi keh raha hu aapka. Ye D6G model ka naam hai na?
Customer: Haan haan. Aur operating weight iska kitna hai sir?
Customer: Wo bhi brochure mein hai uska ek second aapko bolna padega. Jaise 5 ton se 20 ton ka nahi nahi nahi nahi. Operating weight 17 ya 18 ton ke aas pass hai uska.
Executive: 20 kar sakte hain kya?
Customer: Ek minute originally daal dijiye kyuki kaisa ye latest tum ye wala machine hai. Ya to paanch hai sir 20 hai 30 hai.
Customer: Kya kya?
Customer: Operating weight jo main aapko bata rahi hu.
Haan.
Customer: Wo ya to yaha se 5 ton kar sakta hai ya to 20 ton kar sakta hai ya 30 ton.
Customer: 20 ton daal dijiye operating weight actually iska 16 ton 17 ton hai 17000 kg. To 20 to phir bhi uske paas hi hai. Hmm thik hai. Engine power kya hai sir 120 HP 160 HP 200 HP ya phir kuch aur?
Customer: Kitna kitna?
Executive: 120 HP 160 HP 200 HP.
Customer: 160 HP hai ye. Nahi nahi actually ye ek second ek second 162 HP barabar hai haan. 160 thik hai. Haan.
Executive: To ye product sir maine add kar diya aapka. Idhar table laga hua hai. Photo sir iske mujhe aur chahiye rahenge aur jo photos aap bhejoge na sir usme ek baar ye dekh lu ki uska jo side ka wo rehta hai na kya kehte hain usko dimensions wo 1000 cross 1000 ka hona chahiye tha tabhi number milega aapko isme.
Hmm.
Executive: To photos ka thoda sa aap dekh lo baki isme category kya add karu sir? Cat bulldozer dal sakte hain kya?
Customer: Haan cat bulldozer.
Executive: Cat bulldozer thik hai to ye maine dal diya hai. Aur abhi sir jo aapka ticket khula hua hai main ye close kar du sir?
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai to aapke paas sir mail pe na ek feedback ke liye jayega please uspe revert kar dena satisfied. Thik hai okay haan. Okay sir thank you so much. Silver colour ka nikal ke bas.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add bulldozer product to IndiaMART.

- Needs help adding product specifications.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to add product on call.

- Executive added the product with specifications.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product addition, specifications, bulldozer, feedback
